title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 5 categories on the x axis representing Month, and Unit sales in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The highest category is found at June 2018 where Unit sales in millions is 50.0.
The lowest category is found at May 2017 where Unit sales in millions is 2.0.
The highest value at June 2018 is almost 25.0 times larger than the minimum value of May 2017.
The highest value at June 2018 is almost 25.0 times larger than the minimum value of May 2017.
The difference between the max Month June 2018 and min Month May 2017 is 48.0.
